defaultTheme.description: "light" or "dark" theme to be used by default

disableThemeSwitcher.description: Set to "true" to disable the theme switcher

featuredImageUrl.description: Path for the post's featured image

featuredImageAlt.description: Path for the post's alt featured image

faviconImageUrl.description: Path for the site favicon (browser tab icon)

truncateTitleLength.description: Max length for the post's title in article cards

truncateContentLength.description: Max length for the post's content in article cards

sidebarMenu.description: Menu to be used in the page's sidebar

asideHtml.description: HTML to be used in the page's aside section

sidebarAsideHtml.description: HTML to be used in the page's aside section located in the sidebar

inlineAside.description: HTML to be used in the page's inline aside section

footerCta.description: HTML to be used in the footer section

warningHtml.description: HTML to be shown over the content

contentFooterHtml.description: HTML to be shown under the content
